Header: Major General W.A.K.B Udalupola Greeted upon His Recent Promotion
Content: Major General W.A.K.B Udalupola upon his return to the Headquarters 23 Infantry Division on Saturday (6) after elevation to the rank of Major General was honoured in a Guard Turnout and a Guard of Honour by 23 Division troops. A Guard Turnout at the main gate greeted him and thereafter he took the salute in the Guard of Honour in conformity with military traditions. After the military honours, he posed for a group photograph with all Officers present. Subsequently, he planted a sapling in front of the Division Headquarters premises and added memories. Later, the day's ceremony concluded with an all rank tea arrangement.
